advancements.goety_cataclysm.convert_anc: Convert a Modern Remnant to an Ancient Remnant.
advancements.goety_cataclysm.convert_kob: Convert a Koboleton to a Kobolediator.
advancements.goety_cataclysm.convert_wad: Convert a Koboleton to a Wadjet.
advancements.goety_cataclysm.root.title: The Cataclysm Arts
advancements.goety_cataclysm.summon_cora: Summon a Coralssus with an Animation Core.
advancements.goety_cataclysm.summon_ende: Summon an Ender Golem with an Animation Core.
advancements.goety_cataclysm.summon_neth: Summon a Netherite Monstrosity with an Infernal Forge.
Summons an Abyss Mark that will either follow a target or stay at pointed position before summoning a Abyssal Beam.
Summons Abyss Mines around caster or valid target that will explode and gives Abyssal Fear effect.
item.goety_cataclysm.abyssal_orb_focus.i: Summons several Abyss Orbs around the caster, that will slowly chase down and explode onto a target or a nearby valid entity.
item.goety_cataclysm.amethyst_cluster_fo: Shoots Amethyst Clusters around the caster.
Shoots a torrent of hot ash in front of them, blinding non-allied targets.
Summons Elite Draugr Servants. Cast crouching will summon the caster's servants towards them.
Summons Draugr Servants. Cast crouching will summon the caster's servants towards them.
item.goety_cataclysm.cursed_tomb_focus.i: Summons Royal Draugr Servants. Cast crouching will summon the caster's servants towards them.
item.goety_cataclysm.death_laser_focus.i: Shoots a deadly laser that deals constant damage.
Summons Ancient Desert Steles around the caster, that will then drop and damage any non-allied targets below them.
item.goety_cataclysm.desert_raid_focus.i: Summons Koboleton Servants. Cast crouching will summon the caster's servants towards them.
item.goety_cataclysm.extinct_flame_focus: Summons several of Ignis' Fireballs around the caster, that will fire towards a pointed target or a nearby valid entity.
item.goety_cataclysm.flare_bomb_focus.in: Shoots a Flare Bomb. A Flare Bomb will non-destructively explode upon impact and summon Flare Jets in either a plus or cross pattern.
item.goety_cataclysm.kakourgos_focus.inf: Summons Urchinkin Servants. Cast crouching will summon the caster's servants towards them.
item.goety_cataclysm.kyria_focus.info: Summons Cindaria Servants. Cast crouching will summon the caster's servants towards them.
item.goety_cataclysm.lightning_spear_foc: Shoots a lightning spear. The spear will leave behind a cloud of electricity that damages enemies on them.
item.goety_cataclysm.polemistis_focus.in: Summons Symbiocto Servants, riding on Drowned Host Servants. Cast crouching will summon the caster's servants towards them.
item.goety_cataclysm.sandstorm_focus.inf: Summons Sandstorm that surrounds and follows the caster, damaging nearby non-allied targets.
item.goety_cataclysm.storm_serpent_focus: Summons Storm Serpents that will lunge at target or a nearby valid entity.
item.goety_cataclysm.sunken_current_focu: Summons Deepling Brute Servants. Cast crouching will summon the caster's servants towards them.
Summons Deepling or Deepling Angler Servants. Cast crouching will summon the caster's servants towards them.
item.goety_cataclysm.sunken_tribune_focu: Summons Deepling Priest or Warlock Servants. Cast crouching will summon the caster's servants towards them.
Casting causes a storm to rage around the caster, blowing nearby entities away, before shooting multiple lightning and water spear from the clouds above.
item.goety_cataclysm.void_rune_focus.inf: Summons a row of Void Runes in front of caster. Cast crouching will summon Void Runes around the caster.
item.goety_cataclysm.void_vortex_focus.i: Summons a Void Vortex at a target or location, causing nearby non-allied entities to be sucked into it, before it explodes.
item.goety_cataclysm.water_spear_focus.i: Shoots a Water Spear. The spear will bounce and ricochet off walls and blocks.
